line.text:
Due to a police investigation at the Franklin Avenue Station, downtown [4] train service is running local from the Atlantic Avenue Station to the Franklin Avenue Station.

Please allow additional travel time.



Planned Work

[5] No trains between 149 St-Grand Concourse and Dyre Av

[2] Trains and free shuttle buses provide alternate service
Weekend, 12:01 AM Sat to 5 AM Mon, Dec 17 - 19

[5] service operates between Bowling Green and 149 St-Grand Concourse,
days and evenings only.

[2] trains replace the [5] between 149 St-Grand Concourse and E 180 St.
• Transfer between [2] and [5] trains at 149 St-Grand Concourse.

Shuttle buses provide alternate service between E 180 St and Dyre Av.
• Transfer between shuttle buses and [2] trains at E 180 St.


StationShuttle Bus StopBus Stop
E 180 St  [2] Morris Park Av at East 180 StBx21
Morris ParkMorris Park Av at Hone AvBx21
Pelham PkwyWilliamsbridge Rd at Pelham PkwyBx8
Gun Hill RdGun Hill Rd at DeWitt Place (to East 180 St)  Bx28
Gun Hill Rd at Knapp St (to Dyre Av) Bx28
Baychester Av  Boston Rd at Baychester Av (to East 180 St)  Bx30
Baychester Av at Boston Rd (to Dyre Av) —
Dyre AvDyre Av at Light StBx16


    This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.  

_______________________________
line.plannedworkheadline:
[5] No trains between 149 St-Grand Concourse and Dyre Av
[2] Trains and free shuttle buses provide alternate service

line.name: ACE
line.text: Due to an earlier incident at 75th Avenue, Jamaica-bound [E] and [F] train service has resumed with residual delays.

line.name: BDFM
line.text:
Due to an earlier incident at 75th Avenue, Jamaica-bound [E] and [F] train service has resumed with residual delays.



Planned Work

[D] 205 St-bound trains run via the [N] from Stillwell Av to 36 St

Weekend, 12:01 AM Sat to 5 AM Mon, Dec 17 - 19

Trains stop at New Utrecht Av-62 St.

For service to Bay 50 St, 25 Av, Bay Pkwy, 20, 18 Avs, 79 and 71 Sts,
take the [D] to New Utrecht Av-62 St and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [D] or [N]*.

For service to 55, 50 Sts, Fort Hamilton Pkwy and 9 Av, take the [D] to 36 St
and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [D] or [N]*.

For service from these stations, take the [D] or [N]* to 62 St-New Utrecht Av or
Stillwell Av and transfer to a 205 St-bound [D].

*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.
_______________________________


[F] Coney Island-bound trains run local from 71 Av to Roosevelt Av

Night, 11 PM Sat to 6:45 AM Sun, Dec 17 - 18

Trains make local stops at 67 Av, 63 Dr, Woodhaven Blvd, Grand and Elmhurst Avs.

• Please allow additional travel time.
______________________________


[M] Trains run approximately every 24 minutes between Metropolitan Av and Myrtle Av

Weekend, 4 AM Sat to 10 PM Sun, Dec 17 - 18

• Please allow additional travel time.

Note: Overnight [M] service runs every 20 minutes.
_____________________________
line.plannedworkheadline:
[D] 205 St-bound trains run via the [N] from Stillwell Av to 36 St

[F] Coney Island-bound trains run local from 71 Av to Roosevelt Av

[M] Trains run approximately every 24 minutes between Metropolitan Av and Myrtle Av

line.name: NQR
line.text:
Planned Work

[N] Coney Island-bound trains run via the [D] from 36 St to Stillwell Av

Weekend, 12:01 AM Sat to 5 AM Mon, Dec 17 - 19

Trains stop at 62 St-New Utrecht Av.

For 45, 53 and 59 Sts, take the [R] instead. Transfer between trains at 36 St.

For service to 8 Av, Fort Hamilton Pkwy, 18, 20 Avs, Bay Pkwy, Kings Hwy,
Avenue U and 86 St, take the [N] to 62 St-New Utrecht Av or Stillwell Av and
transfer to a Manhattan-bound [D]* or [N].

For service from these stations, take the [D]* or [N] to New Utrecht Av-62 St or 36 St
and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [D] or [N].

*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.
_______________________________
line.plannedworkheadline: [N] Coney Island-bound trains run via the [D] from 36 St to Stillwell Av

line.name: BX1 - BX55
line.text:
Planned Detour Bx10 buses being detoured due to DEP work

Weekend, 6 AM Sat to 5 AM Mon, Dec 17 - 19

Buses are being detoured from Goulden Av between West 205 St and
Sedgwick Av, then will operate as follows:

Westbound:  Via Paul Av, stay on Paul Av, left on Mosholu Park Way,
left on Sedgwick Av and regular route.

Eastbound:  Via Sedgwick Av, right on West Mosholu Park Way South,
right on Paul Av and regular route.

Buses will use Bx28 bus stops in both directions.

• Please allow additional travel time.
______________________________


Bx12, Bx12 SBS and Bx22 bus stops are temporarily discontinued due to road construction

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from Fordham Rd between Bronx River Pkwy and
Southern Blvd, then will operate as follows:

The Bx12 and Bx22 bus stop at Southern Blvd will be temporarily discontinued.
Buses will stop at Belmont Av in both directions.

The Bx12 SBS bus stop at Southern Blvd will be temporarily discontinued.
Buses will stop at Crotona Av in both directions.

• Please allow additional travel time.
_______________________________

line.name: M1 - M116
line.text:
Planned Detour Holiday Bus Stop Changes

Until Saturday Jan 7, 2012

Buses will not stop on Fifth Av at 49 and 50 Sts, or on Sixth Av at 49 and 50 Sts.

M1, M1Ltd, M4, M4Ltd and Q32        
Use the 52 St bus stop instead.
Local buses also stop at 46 St.

M2, M2Ltd, M3, M5 and M5Ltd
Use the 53 St bus stop instead.
Local buses also stop at 47 St.

M5, M5Ltd, M7
Use the 47 St bus stop instead.

• Please allow additional travel time.
______________________________


M1, M7 and M102 bus stops are temporarily discontinued due to road construction

Until further notice

The following bus stops will be temporarily discontinued:

M1, M7 and M102 (Northbound): Lenox Av between 142 and 143 Sts.

M1, M7 and M102 (Southbound): Lenox Av between 142 and 141 Sts.

Note:  Customers are advised to use the nearest available bus stop.
______________________________


M50 buses detoured due to heavy pedestrian traffic

All times until Jan 7

Buses are being detoured in the vicinity of Rockefeller Center, then will
operate as follows:

Eastbound:  Via West 50 St, left on 6 Av, right on West 57 St, right on
Lexington Av, left on East 50 St and regular route.

Westbound:  Via East 49 St, right on Madison Av, left on East 57 St,
left on 7 Av, right on West 49 St and regular route.

Buses will make all corresponding stops.

• Please allow additional travel time.
_______________________________

line.name: Q1 - Q113
line.text:
Planned Detour Q2 buses detoured due to road work

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from Hempstead Turnpike between 223 and 225 Sts,
then will operate as follows:

Eastbound:  Via Hempstead Turnpike, right on 223 St, left on 104 Av, left on
225 St, right on Hempstead Turnpike and regular route.

Westbound:  Via Hempstead Turnpike, left on 225 St, right on 104 Av, right on 223
St, left on Hempstead Turnpike and regular route.

Buses will make all stops at corresponding locations.

• Please allow additional travel time.
______________________________


Holiday Bus Stop Changes

Until Saturday Jan 7, 2012

Buses will not stop on Fifth Av at 49 and 50 Sts, or on Sixth Av at 49 and 50 Sts.

M1, M1Ltd, M4, M4Ltd and Q32        
Use the 52 St bus stop instead.
Local buses also stop at 46 St.

M2, M2Ltd, M3, M5 and M5Ltd
Use the 53 St bus stop instead.
Local buses also stop at 47 St.

M5, M5Ltd, M7
Use the 47 St bus stop instead.

• Please allow additional travel time.
______________________________

line.name: QM1 - QM25
line.text:
Planned Detour Holiday Bus Stop Changes

Until Saturday Jan 7, 2012

Buses will not stop on Fifth Av at 49 and 50 Sts, or on Sixth Av at 49 and 50 Sts.

QM1, QM5, QM6
Use the 6 Av/48 St bus stop instead.

• Please allow additional travel time.
______________________________


Holiday Bus Stop Changes

Until Saturday Jan 7, 2012

Buses will not stop on Fifth Av at 49 and 50 Sts, or on Sixth Av at 49 and 50 Sts.

QM10, QM12
Use the 6 Av/51 St bus stop instead.

QM15, QM16, QM17, QM18
Use the 6 Av/48 St bus stop instead.

• Please allow additional travel time.
______________________________


QM16 Buses rerouted to Jacob Riis Park

Beginning 5 AM, Monday, Dec 5

The new terminus is adjacent to the west end of the Boathouse and opposite the parking lot,
where there is increased parking availability. Customers may park their cars at the Jacob Riis
Park parking lot and ride the QM16.

Service discontinued to the Roxbury terminus on Beach 169 St at Rockaway Point Blvd.

Customers at this bus stop may use the Q22 and transfer to the QM16 on Rockaway Beach Blvd at Beach 147 St at no additional charge when using a MetroCard.

All other QM16 bus stops in Queens and Midtown remain unchanged.
_________________________________


QM16 bus route change

Beginning, Monday, Dec 5

Bus service to the Roxbury terminal on Beach 169 St at Rockaway Point Blvd
Blvd will be terminated and a new terminal established on Rockaway Beach Blvd
at Jacob Riis Park.

Discontinued bus stop:
Beach 169 St at Rockaway Point Blvd

New bus stop:
Rockaway Beach Blvd at Jacob Riis Park

• Please allow additional travel time.
______________________________

line.name: x1 - x68
line.text:
Planned Detour Holiday Bus Stop Changes

Until Saturday Jan 7, 2012

Buses will not stop on Fifth Av at 49 and 50 Sts, or on Sixth Av at 49 and 50 Sts.

X1, X7, X9
These buses will not stop at 50 St/Rockefeller Plaza or at 5 Av/48 St.
Use the 7 Av/50 St bus stop instead.

• Please allow additional travel time.
______________________________

line.name: West Hempstead
line.text:
West Hempstead Branch Customers:

There is no longer weekend service on the West Hempstead branch.

Please utilize Babylon, Far Rockaway and Hempstead branches.

line.name: Harlem
line.text:
Southbound trains will not be stopping at Melrose until further notice. Customers at Melrose wishing to go Southbound must board a Northbound train at Tremont or Fordham where they can board a Southbound train.

Customers on Southbound trains traveling to Melrose must get off at Harlem-125th street and take a Northbound Harlem line train to Melrose.
